00022 Wire::WireTypeDef::WireTypeDef(QDomNode &wireTypeNode): typeName_(QString()),
00023 constrained_(false), typeDefinitions_(), viewNameRefs_() {
00024 
00025         for (int i = 0; i < wireTypeNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00026                 QDomNode tempNode = wireTypeNode.childNodes().at(i);
00027 
00028                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeName")) {
00029                         Wire::WireTypeDef::typeName_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00030                                         nodeValue();
00031 
00032                         // get the constrained attribute
00033                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00034                         QString constrained = attributeMap.namedItem(
00035                                         QString("spirit:constrained")).nodeValue();
00036                         Wire::WireTypeDef::constrained_ =
00037                                         General::str2Bool(constrained, false);
00038                 }
00039 
00040                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:typeDefinition")) {
00041                         Wire::WireTypeDef::typeDefinitions_.append(
00042                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00043                 }
00044 
00045                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:viewNameRef")) {
00046                         Wire::WireTypeDef::viewNameRefs_.append(
00047                                         tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue());
00048                 }
00049         }
00050 
00051         // if mandatory elements are missing
00052         if (Wire::WireTypeDef::typeName_.isNull()) {
00053                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:typeName missing"
00054                                 " in spirit:wireTypeDef"));
00055         }
00056 
00057         if (Wire::WireTypeDef::viewNameRefs_.size() < 1) {
00058                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element spirit:viewNameRef "
00059                                 "missing in spirit:wireTypeDef"));
00060         }
00061 }

00080 Wire::WireTypeDef& Wire::WireTypeDef::operator=( const WireTypeDef& other ) {
00081 
00082         if (this != &other) {
00083                 typeName_ = other.typeName_;
00084                 constrained_ = other.constrained_;
00085                 typeDefinitions_ = other.typeDefinitions_;
00086                 viewNameRefs_ = other.viewNameRefs_;
00087         }

00091 bool Wire::WireTypeDef::hasView( const QString& viewName ) {
00092         // if view is not specified then it is always found
00093         if (viewName.isEmpty()) {
00094                 return true;
00095         }
00096         foreach (QString viewRef, viewNameRefs_) {
00097                 if (viewRef == viewName)
00098                         return true;
00099 
00100         }
00101         return false;
00102 }

00104 Wire::Wire(QDomNode &wireNode): direction_(General::DIRECTION_INVALID),
00105                 allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_(false), vector_(), wireTypeDefs_(),
00106                 defaultDriverValue_(), defaultValueAttributes_() {
00107 
00108         // get attribute spirit:allLogicalDirectionsAllowed
00109         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = wireNode.attributes();
00110         QString allLogicalDirectionsAllowed = attributeMap.namedItem(
00111                         QString("spirit:allLogicalDirectionsAllowed")).nodeValue();
00112         allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_ =
00113                         General::str2Bool(allLogicalDirectionsAllowed, false);
00114 
00115         // go through the child nodes of spirit:wire
00116         for (int i = 0; i < wireNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00117                 QDomNode tempNode = wireNode.childNodes().at(i);
00118 
00119                 if (tempNode.nodeName() ==      QString("spirit:direction")) {
00120                         direction_ = General::str2Direction(
00121                                 General::removeWhiteSpace(tempNode.childNodes().at(0).
00122                                         nodeValue()),
00123                                         General::DIRECTION_INVALID);
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 // get spirit:vector node and parse left and right values
00127                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:vector")) {
00128                         vector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>(
00129                                         new Vector(tempNode));
00130                 }
00131 
00132                 // get spirit:wireTypeDefs
00133                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:wireTypeDefs")) {
00134                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00135 
00136                                 QDomNode wireTypeNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00137                                 wireTypeDefs_.append(QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef>(
00138                                                 new WireTypeDef(wireTypeNode)));
00139                         }
00140                 }
00141 
00142                 // get spirit:driver
00143                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:driver")) {
00144                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00145                                 QDomNode driverNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00146                                 if (driverNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:defaultValue")) {
00147                                         defaultDriverValue_ =
00148                                                         driverNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00149 
00150                                         General::parseAttributes(driverNode,
00151                                                         defaultValueAttributes_);
00152                                 }
00153                         }
00154                 }
00155         }
00156 
00157         // if mandatory element spirit:direction was not successfully defined
00158         if (direction_ == General::DIRECTION_INVALID) {
00159                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element direction invalid in"
00160                         " spirit:wire"));
00161         }
00162 
00163         return;
00164 }

00169 Wire::Wire(Wire const& other) : 
00170 direction_(other.direction_),
00171 allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_(other.allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_),
00172 vector_(),
00173 wireTypeDefs_(), 
00174 defaultDriverValue_(other.defaultDriverValue_),
00175 defaultValueAttributes_(other.defaultValueAttributes_) {
00176         
00177         if (other.vector_)      {
00178                 vector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>(new Vector(*other.vector_));
00179         }
00180 
00181         foreach (QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef> typeDef, other.wireTypeDefs_) {
00182                 if (typeDef) {
00183                         QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef> copy = QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef>(
00184                                 new WireTypeDef(*typeDef.data()));
00185                         wireTypeDefs_.append(copy);
00186                 }
00187         }
00188 }

00191 Wire & Wire::operator=( const Wire &other ) {
00192         if (this != &other) {
00193                 direction_ = other.direction_;
00194                 allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_ = other.allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_;
00195                 defaultDriverValue_ = other.defaultDriverValue_;
00196                 defaultValueAttributes_ = other.defaultValueAttributes_;
00197 
00198                 if (other.vector_)      {
00199                         vector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>(new Vector(*other.vector_));
00200                 }
00201                 else
00202                         vector_ = QSharedPointer<Vector>();
00203 
00204                 wireTypeDefs_.clear();
00205                 foreach (QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef> typeDef, other.wireTypeDefs_) {
00206                         if (typeDef) {
00207                                 QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef> copy = QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef>(
00208                                         new WireTypeDef(*typeDef.data()));
00209                                 wireTypeDefs_.append(copy);
00210                         }
00211                 }
00212         }
00213         return *this;
00214 }

00243 void Wire::write( QXmlStreamWriter& writer, const QStringList& viewNames ) {
00244 
00245         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:wire");
00246         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:allLogicalDirectionsAllowed",
00247                         General::bool2Str(allLogicalDirectionsAllowed_));
00248 
00249         if (direction_ == General::DIRECTION_INVALID) {
00250                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element directions invalid in"
00251                                 " spirit:wire"));
00252         }
00253         else {
00254                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:direction",
00255                                 General::direction2Str(direction_));
00256         }
00257 
00258         // if optional element spirit:vector is defined
00259         if (vector_) {
00260                 vector_->write(writer);
00261         }
00262 
00263         if (wireTypeDefs_.size() != 0) {
00264                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:wireTypeDefs");
00265 
00266                 // go through each wire type def
00267                 for (int i = 0; i < wireTypeDefs_.size(); ++i) {
00268                         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:wireTypeDef");
00269 
00270                         // write typeName is its found
00271                         if (wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->typeName_.isEmpty()) {
00272                                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory typeName missing in"
00273                                                 " spirit:wireTypeDef"));
00274                         }
00275                         else {
00276                                 // start the spirit:typeName tag
00277                                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:typeName");
00278 
00279                                 // write the attribute for type name
00280                                 writer.writeAttribute("spirit:constrained",
00281                                                 General::bool2Str(wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->constrained_));
00282 
00283                                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00284                                 writer.writeCharacters(wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->typeName_);
00285                                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:typeName
00286                         }
00287 
00288                         // write all type definitions
00289                         for (int j = 0; j < wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->typeDefinitions_.size();
00290                                         ++j) {
00291                                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:typeDefinition",
00292                                                 wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->typeDefinitions_.at(j));
00293                         }
00294 
00295                         // if no viewNameRefs are defined
00296                         if (wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->viewNameRefs_.size() == 0 &&
00297                                 viewNames.isEmpty()) {
00298                                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element viewNameRef "
00299                                                 "missing in spirit:wireTypeDef"));
00300                         }
00301 
00302                         // write all viewNameRefs that were already specified
00303                         foreach (QString viewRef, wireTypeDefs_.at(i)->viewNameRefs_) {
00304 
00305                                 if (!viewNames.contains(viewRef) && !viewRef.isEmpty()) {
00306                                         writer.writeTextElement("spirit:viewNameRef", viewRef);
00307                                 }
00308                         }
00309                         // write the rest of the views
00310                         foreach (QString viewRef, viewNames) {
00311                                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:viewNameRef", viewRef);
00312                         }
00313 
00314                         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:wireTypeDef
00315                 }
00316 
00317                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:wireTypeDefs
00318         }
00319 
00320         // if optional defaultDriverValue exists
00321         if (!defaultDriverValue_.isEmpty()) {
00322 
00323                 // the default value is inside spirit:driver in IP-Xact
00324                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:driver");
00325 
00326                 // start the spirit:defaultValue tag
00327                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:defaultValue");
00328 
00329                 // write the attributes for the element
00330                 General::writeAttributes(writer, defaultValueAttributes_);
00331 
00332                 // write the value of the element and close the tag
00333                 writer.writeCharacters(defaultDriverValue_);
00334                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:defaultValue
00335 
00336                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:driver
00337         }
00338 
00339         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:wire
00340 }

00394 bool Wire::isValid() const {
00395         
00396         // if direction is not specified
00397         if (direction_ == General::DIRECTION_INVALID)
00398                 return false;
00399 
00400         // if vector exists but is not valid
00401         if (vector_ && !vector_->isValid())
00402                 return false;
00403 
00404         // check all wireTypeDefs
00405         for (int i = 0; i < wireTypeDefs_.size(); ++i) {
00406 
00407                 // if typeName or viewNameRef is not specified for wireTypeDef
00408                 if (wireTypeDefs_.value(i)->typeName_.isEmpty() ||
00409                         wireTypeDefs_.value(i)->viewNameRefs_.isEmpty())
00410                         return false;
00411         }
00412 
00413         // everything ok
00414         return true;
00415 }

00419                 vector_->setLeft(leftBound);

00424         }

00438 QString Wire::getTypeName( const QString& viewName /*= QString("")*/ ) const {
00439         
00440         foreach (QSharedPointer<Wire::WireTypeDef> wtypeDef, wireTypeDefs_) {
00441                 if (wtypeDef->hasView(viewName)) {
00442                         return wtypeDef->typeName_;
00443                 }
00444         }
00445 
00446         // if no type declaration was found
00447         return QString("");
00448 }
00449 
00450 void Wire::setTypeName( const QString& typeName, const QString& viewName /*= QString("")*/ ) {
00451         
00452         bool added = false;
00453         for (QList<QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef> >::iterator i = wireTypeDefs_.begin();
00454                 i != wireTypeDefs_.end(); ++i) {
00455                         if ((*i)->hasView(viewName)) {
00456                                 (*i)->typeName_ = typeName;
00457                                 added = true;
00458                         }
00459         }
00460 
00461         // if there were no matches then create new one
00462         if (!added) {
00463                 QSharedPointer<Wire::WireTypeDef> wtypedef(new Wire::WireTypeDef(typeName, viewName));
00464                 wireTypeDefs_.append(wtypedef);
00465         }
00466 }

00468 QString Wire::getTypeDefinition( const QString& typeName ) {
00469         foreach (QSharedPointer<Wire::WireTypeDef> wtypeDef, wireTypeDefs_) {
00470                 // if the type def is for the type name that is wanted
00471                 if (wtypeDef->typeName_ == typeName) {
00472 
00473                         // return the first type definition, if there are none then return 
00474                         // empty string
00475                         return wtypeDef->typeDefinitions_.value(0, QString(""));
00476                 }
00477         }
00478 
00479         // if none was found
00480         return QString("");
00481 }

00483 QStringList Wire::getTypeDefinitions() const {
00484         QStringList typeDefs;
00485         foreach (QSharedPointer<Wire::WireTypeDef> wtypeDef, wireTypeDefs_) {
00486                 typeDefs.append(wtypeDef->typeDefinitions_);
00487         }
00488         return typeDefs;
00489 }

00492 void Wire::setTypeDefinition( const QString& typeName, const QString& typeDefinition ) {
00493         bool added = false;
00494         for (QList<QSharedPointer<WireTypeDef> >::iterator i = wireTypeDefs_.begin();
00495                 i != wireTypeDefs_.end(); ++i) {
00496                 
00497                         if ((*i)->typeName_ == typeName) {
00498                                 (*i)->typeDefinitions_.clear();
00499                                 (*i)->typeDefinitions_.insert(0, typeDefinition);
00500                                 added = true;
00501                         }
00502         }
00503 
00504         // if there were no matches then create new one
00505         if (!added) {
00506                 QSharedPointer<Wire::WireTypeDef> wtypedef(new Wire::WireTypeDef(typeName));
00507                 wtypedef->typeDefinitions_.append(typeDefinition);
00508                 wireTypeDefs_.append(wtypedef);
00509         }
00510 }

00512 bool Wire::hasType( const QString& viewName /*= QString("")*/ ) const {
00513         
00514         foreach (QSharedPointer<Wire::WireTypeDef> wtypeDef, wireTypeDefs_) {
00515                 
00516                 // if view is not specified and the type name is found
00517                 if (viewName.isEmpty() && !wtypeDef->typeName_.isEmpty()) {
00518                         return true;
00519                 }
00520                 
00521                 // if view is the searched one and type name is found
00522                 else if (wtypeDef->hasView(viewName) && !wtypeDef->typeName_.isEmpty()) {
00523                         return true;
00524                 }
00525         }
00526         return false;
00527 }
